name: Intellectual Fortress
descricao:
For the duration, you or one willing creature you can see within range has resistance to psychic damage, as well as advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.
	**Enhance Spell**. For each 20000 mana and 100 per minute, you can target one additional creature. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
